name: Nero,Environexus
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen lights”
”Alexa, set living lights to 10%”
”Alexa, turn on bedroom lamp”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill connects Alexa with the Nero automation platform to provide voice control of your home automation system, powered by the Smart Voice automation engine.

Through simple voice commands, you can control individual devices, or set the mood with a scene. Some example phrases are;
"Alexa, turn Kitchen Bench lights on"
"Alexa, set Living Downlights to 40%"

Notice: To use this Skill you need to have an active Environexus Nero Account with a Smart Voice License and Account, sold separately.

NOTE: This skill may not be suitable for people of all ages
